name: Paper Plane - Casual Airplane Shooter Game for Kids and Toddlers HD
name_original: Paper Plane - Casual Airplane Shooter Game for Kids and Toddlers HD
description:
How many level can you win with all those paper plane flying around?
This is a super fun casual game for kids and adults, but you need to be careful. Use your finger to make the plane fall down to achieve the goal for each airplane.

New planes will come up as you progress through the game. Each plane has its own special ability and need to be touch down! Kids from 3 to 7 years old that love airplane will love this game!

How to Play:
- Goal for each airplane are shown at the bottom
- Touch the right airplane until you attain the goal for each airplane
- Don't bust your goal or you will have to start over
- Collect extra time if you can

Game Features:
- Super fun for kids (seriously!)
- HD graphics
- Casual game for kids and adults
- Simple one touch control gameplay
